Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Prime Retail Land - Build-to-Suit for Sale/Lease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the hard corner of Fort Street and Leroy. Approximately one mile from Southgate Shopping Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
+	1.4 acres available, located at the southeast corner of Fort Street and Leroy Street
+	Adjacent to successful Meijer and new 100,000 SF climate-controlled self-storage facility, in addition to a new, ground-up freestanding retail center with tenants Panda Express and Smoothie King (Now Open!)(Now Open!)
+	Traffic counts exceeding 40,000+ vehicles per day on Fort Street
+	Nearly 300’ premier frontage on heavily trafficked retail corridor
+	Zoned C-2; General Business, permitting a wide variety of uses
+	Trade area anchored by Meijer, Walmart, ALDI, Kroger Marketplace and Lowe’s

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Up to 20 acres net usable of commercial zoned land area. Suitable for Entertainment, Grocery, Fitness, Hotels, Restaurants, Residential and Multi-Family!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New High Profile Mixed-Use Development with 67 Acres

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Opportunity for monument and building signage on 7 Mile Road (16K+ VPD)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in the prestigious community of Northville, Michigan, this 1.68-acre site on 7 Mile Road just west of Haggerty is an ideal location for a variety of business uses. The property lies within one of the strongest retail corridors and densely populated residential areas in Southeast Michigan. Just east of the site is a new mixeduse
development (Northville Park Place) that is anchored by Trader Joes, University of Michigan Health System, and Cooper Standard (World HQ) comprised of ± 275,000 SF of retail, medical and office/flex space with additional land to accommodate future growth.
